description: This file defines a ThemeService class that provides style configurations and helper functions for theming in an application, including palette retrieval and surface glow effects.

classes.name: ThemeService
classes.description: A service class that centralizes style guide values and exposes helper methods such as getting color palettes and applying visual effects to elements.

methods.name: getPalette() { getPalette
methods.description: Returns an object representing the Ocean Professional color palette with specific color codes.

methods.name: applySurfaceGlow(el: HTMLElement | null) { applySurfaceGlow
methods.description: Applies a subtle box-shadow glow to a given HTMLElement for user feedback, with a timed removal.

ctags.name: st
ctags.pattern: /^    const st = (globalThis as any).setTimeout as ((h: any, t?: number)=>any) | undefined;$/
